snippet.title: Closed Alpha on Sep 25 // Announcement Trailer - Fate Trigger
snippet.description:
Anime Heroes Storm the Arena! 
- Wishlist and join our Closed Alpha on Steam at bit.ly/fttnpven
- Or sign up for the test via the official website at bit.ly/fttnstpven
- Join our official Discord at discord.gg/fatetrigger

Fate Trigger: The Novita is a 3D Anime-style, hero-based tactical shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5, available across multiple platforms. Dive into a dynamic world of floating islands, become a sharpshooter with extraordinary special skills, craft your own strategies, and engage in thrilling, spectacular life-or-death showdowns! 

*It is Alpha footage, not the final version.

- Socials
Learn more about the game at bit.ly/fttnpven
Join our Discord Server at discord.gg/fatetrigger
Follow us on X at x.com/FateTrigger_EN
Follow us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/FateTrigger

#FateTrigger #FateTriggerTheNovita #TheNovita #Novita
